DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety efficacy treatment Liposonix System ( Model 2 ) circumferential reduction subcutaneous adipose tissue ( SAT ) thighs .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Subcutaneous Adipose Tissue Thighs Using High Intensity Focused Ultrasound
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects receive single treatment ( Liposonix System ) one randomly assign thigh . The opposite thigh treat serve control subject .
DOC.criteria: Male female subject 1860 year age Body Mass Index ≤30 lb/in2 Thickness adipose tissue least 1.0 cm beyond select focal depth area treat ( ≥2.3cm ) Subjects must agree alter regular diet exercise routine course study Subjects must willing able comply study visit requirement , procedure , assessment Subject must understand nature study sign IRB approve Informed Consent Subjects pregnant Subjects diagnose coagulation disorder receive anticoagulant therapy Subject prior aesthetic procedure area treat Subjects pacemaker , defibrillator , implantable electrical device Subject significant circumferential asymmetry thigh
